job.title: Lead Azure/Python Engineer (Remote)

job.description: Lead Software Engineer $150k - $160k 100% Remote 8+ years of software development with a good background using Azure and ideally Python + Leadership experience is highly desired  We are a 200 person extremely well funded software company in the agricultural solutions space. We are focused on unlocking the global genetic potential of plants to enhance the sustainability of food, feed, fiber and fuel production. We and our partners harness natural and novel genetic variation through breeding, trait development, etc. to develop products that accelerate crop improvement.  We have been ranked in the Inc. 5000 as one of the fastest growing companies for the past several years. We are currently in a major growth phase and hiring a Lead software engineer to help us scale. This position will have split responsibilities between Leadership and hands-on work. We are seeking someone with a heavy Azure background and ideally Python experience.  Top Reasons to Work with Us What You Need for this Position So, if you are a Lead Azure/Python Engineer with experience, please apply today! Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you.
